channel.title: [PI] Skillcape Emote in-game Error
channel.description:
Hey guys, i have had this error for a long period of time & i can't seem to fix it. I added everything for the emotes correctly, but everytime i click the skillcape button for the cape, the animation is correct, but the GFX is just an ice barrage? Can someone please help me?
Here's a picture example of the in-game error:
[center][IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/24qinwl.png[/img][/center]
